job.title: Data Scientist, Product Analytics
job.industry: Health, Wellness and Fitness,Medical Devices,Information Technology and Services
job.description: strongstrongThe OpportunitybrbrstrongstrongAt Teladoc Health data is at the heart of our culture of innovation Were looking for a Data Science analytics team member to collaborate with Product Management and Marketing as we work toward optimizing our UX and messagingbrbrAs a Data Scientist Product Analytics your main focus will be to measure member experience and guide product decisions ultimately making Teladoc Healths products more valuable delightful and intuitive to our Members Were looking for someone with at least 2 years of experience in Data Analytics In addition to technical data science skills core competencies such as collaboration decisionmaking communication and flexibility will be key to your successbrbrThis role offers the challenge and excitement of converting data analysis into reallife benefits Come help us break new ground while measurably improving lives and saving millions in healthcare costsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Provide insights about our products and member experience to inform Product teams for roadmap and feature decisions lili Conduct exploratory analysis and develop statistical models to answer key product usage and engagement questions lili Help Product and Marketing teams use experimentation AB testing and cohorting to test assumptions and launch new marketing campaigns features and product releases lili Partner with Product teams to define and benchmark metrics for new features launches and initiatives and help create a culture of measurement liul strongstrongCandidate Profilebrstrongstrongulli3 years of work experience in productdata analytics or a related disciplineliliData science experience SQL Python R and familiarity with managing large data setsliliA general knowledge of machine learning approaches is a plusliliThe ability to collaborate and communicate with Product Managers and help them craft hypotheses and define and measure KPIsliliConfidence working with ambiguity unknown variables and missing context and the ability to find ways to bridge those gaps when necessaryliliA selfstarter approach with strong motivation and drive for excellenceliliBS degree in Engineering Computer Science or a related filed in lieu of degree relevant work experience andor trade schoolbrliulstrongWhy Join Teladoc HealthbrbrstrongstrongA New Category in Healthcarestrong  Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives  brbrstrongOur Work Truly Mattersstrong Recognized as the world leader in wholeperson virtual care Teladoc Health uses proprietary health signals and personalized interactions to drive better health outcomes across the full continuum of care at every stage in a persons health journey  brbrstrongMake an Impact strongIn more than 175 countries and ranked Best in KLAS for Virtual Care Platforms in 2020 Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and datadriven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals  brbrstrongFocus on PEOPLEstrong  Teladoc Health has been recognized as a top employer by numerous media and
